Math Equation with a footnote

This is an expamle of inline equation \(x^2 + x -1 = 0\)

This is an example of non inline-math equation1: \[ \begin{aligned} & \sum_{n=0}^{\infty} \frac{f^{(n)}(a)}{n !}(x-a)^n \\ & n ! \quad=\text { factorial of } n \\ & a \quad=\text { real or complex number } \\ & f^{(n)}(a)=\text { nth derivative of f evaluated at the point a } \end{aligned} \]

Mermaid

flowchart LR
  A[Hard edge] --> B(Round edge)
  B --> C{Decision}
  B --> D{Decision}
  C --> D[Result one]
  C --> E[Result two]

A Mermaid diagram
